text:
[Verse]
Wake up sunshine bright
Birds singing in flight
Morning light so clear
Chasing away the fear

[Verse 2]
Coffee brewing warm
Life in its sweetest form
Dewdrops on the grass
Moments we hope will last

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams tonight
Everything's gonna be alright
Hold on tight never let go
Love all around we know

[Verse]
Walking hand in hand
Footprints in the sand
Smile at what we see
It's just you and me

[Verse 2]
Whisper in my ear
Things I wanna hear
No need to explain
Dancing in the rain

[Chorus]
Sunshine dreams tonight
Everything's gonna be alright
Hold on tight never let go
Love all around we know
title: Sunshine Dreams
